name: yearly-glance
description: Year at a glance - overview of annual events with customizable management options.

scripts.build:local: tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node scripts/esbuild.config.mjs production keep-console && node scripts/copy-to-vault.mjs
scripts.changelog:u: conventional-changelog -p angular -i CHANGELOG.md -s -u -n ./scripts/changelog-option.js && conventional-changelog -p angular -i CHANGELOG-zh.md -s -u -n ./scripts/changelog-option-zh.js
scripts.changelog:all: conventional-changelog -p angular -i CHANGELOG.md -s -r 0 -n ./scripts/changelog-option.js && conventional-changelog -p angular -i CHANGELOG-zh.md -s -r 0 -n ./scripts/changelog-option-zh.js
scripts.release:pre: npm run build && npm run version && npm run changelog:u
scripts.release:preT: npm run build && npm run version && npm run changelog:uT

author: Moy & RavenHogWarts
